title: I can't start the game after Character Selection
body: After character selection the screen goes black and i can't do anything. How can i fix it?

replies.body:
When this issue happens consistently, it typically means there is some sort of issue where your computer is not able to establish a connection to the individual game server.  Since you aren't able to connect to the game server itself, it just displays a black screen instead of the normal Loading Screen with all of the champions.  In order to get this resolved and get you connection stable, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has the most common solutions that should resolve this black screen issue.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing any issues!
